item.title: COMCAST CORP 10-K
item.description: COMCAST CORP, which is in the Cable & Other Pay Television Services [4841] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 03, 2023 had 39754 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 432 instances services - 346 instances comcast - 307 instances revenue - 304 instances 10 - 253 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
